tool_description: Formats and exports extracted product data into various output formats including CSV, JSON, XML with customizable field selection and structure.

product_data.description: Array of product data objects in JSON string format

output_format.description: Desired output format: csv, json, xml

selected_fields.description: Specific fields to include in output

sort_by.description: Field name to sort results by

sort_ascending.description: Whether to sort in ascending order

error_messages: Empty data set: Provide at least one product data object to export
Invalid output format: Output format must be one of: csv, json, xml
Invalid product data: One or more product data entries are not valid JSON
Invalid sort field: Specified sort field does not exist in the data
Export formatting failed: Unable to format data in the requested output format
Invalid field selection: One or more selected fields do not exist in the data
usage: Provide an array of product data objects and specify the desired output format. Optionally configure field selection, sorting, and metadata inclusion for customized exports.

formatted_data.description: Data formatted in the requested output format

record_count.description: Number of records in the exported data

file_size_bytes.description: Size of the formatted output in bytes
